scripts.build: npm run build:save && npm run build:restore
scripts.build:save: (mkdir -p dist/save || true) && rm -rf dist/save/* && ncc cache clean && ncc build src/save.ts --out dist/save --source-map --quiet
scripts.build:restore: (mkdir -p dist/restore || true) && rm -rf dist/restore/* && ncc cache clean && ncc build src/restore.ts --out dist/restore --source-map --quiet
